definitions.definition: In disrepair or disorder; poorly maintained; lacking upkeep, usually of buildings or vehicles.

parsedExamples.example: They stayed in a ramshackle cabin on the beach.
He entered the ramshackle bus, and was driven a long distance through very sandy streets to the hotel on the St. Lawrence.

examples: They stayed in a ramshackle cabin on the beach.
